sentences.en: a title printed in bold caps
sentences.cn: 以粗体大写字母印刷的标题

sentences.en: Be bold in putting things into practice and blazing new trails.
sentences.cn: 勇于实践,大胆创新.

sentences.en: Big, successful moves need bold, masterful managers.
sentences.cn: 重大而成功的举措需要既大胆又善于控制局势的经理来实施。

sentences.en: Bold as you please, she grabbed me by the sleeve.
sentences.cn: 她真够大胆的，竟抓住了我的衣袖。

sentences.en: He believes that students should be encouraged to experiment with bold ideas.
sentences.cn: 他认为应该鼓励学生们将大胆的观念付诸试验。

sentences.en: He had the ability to take bold imaginative decisions.
sentences.cn: 他能够作出富有创见的大胆决定。

sentences.en: He walked in , bold as brass, wearing nothing but his underpants.
sentences.cn: 他走了进来, 只穿一条衬裤,极为厚颜无耻.

sentences.en: Her words were so bold that people caught their breath.
sentences.cn: 她的话太大胆了,使人们都倒抽了一口气.

sentences.en: I thought his glance at me had been offensively bold.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他对我的瞥视唐突无礼。

sentences.en: In a surprisingly bold move , he is threatening court action against the company.
sentences.cn: 他出人意料地做出一个大胆举动，威胁要起诉这家公司。

sentences.en: May I make ( so ) bold ( as ) to ask your name, Sir?
sentences.cn: 我 斗胆 问一下您尊姓大名, 先生.

sentences.en: My aunt Flo was a bold determined woman.
sentences.cn: 我姑妈芙洛是一个大胆果断的人。

sentences.en: Obviously it was Anne's considered opinion that Mavis was a bold-faced liar.
sentences.cn: 安妮认为梅维斯是个厚颜无耻的骗子，这显然是经过一番深思熟虑后才得出的看法。

sentences.en: Rebels like Katharine Hamnett have made a name for bold, declamatory statements.
sentences.cn: 诸如凯瑟琳·哈姆内特之类的叛逆者以口出大胆、夸张之词而闻名。

sentences.en: She marched into his office as bold as brass (=  very confident and not showing enough respect  ) .
sentences.cn: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

sentences.en: She marched into his office as bold as brass (= very confident and not showing enough respect ).
sentences.cn: 她放肆地直闯进他的办公室。

sentences.en: she marched into the library as bold as brass.
sentences.cn: 她非常无礼地大步走进图书馆。

sentences.en: The bold necklace flatteringly lightens her skin tone.
sentences.cn: 这条光彩夺目的项链衬得她的肤色亮了起来。

sentences.en: The book's 85 colour lithographic plates look staggeringly fresh and bold.
sentences.cn: 这本书的85张彩色平版看起来异常鲜艳醒目。

sentences.en: The head - words in this dictionary are printed in bold type.
sentences.cn: 这部词典的词目是用黑体字排印的.

sentences.en: Use bold type for headings and bullet points for noteworthy achievements.
sentences.cn: 标题使用粗黑字体，显著的成就要用着重号标示。

sentences.en: what would he be calling for, &B{if I might make so bold} as to ask?.
sentences.cn: 我冒昧问一句，他会有什么样的要求呢?。

sentences.en: You should be feeling confident and bold when you meet your bank manager.
sentences.cn: 你会见银行经理的时候要大胆自信。

phrases.phrase: be (或 make) so bold (as to do something)

trans.tran_cn: 敢于冒险的，鲁莽的，轮廓(或色彩)突出的
trans.tran_en: not afraid of taking risks and making difficult decisions
